title: Context Vector Snapshot Schema (CVSS)
description: Defines the required structured state data for P01 Context Vector Capture, capturing crucial metrics from foundational governance models (PVLM, MPAM, ADTM, etc.) at the point of traceability event trigger.

pvlm_state_hash.description: SHA-256 hash representing the immutable state of the Predictive Value & Latency Model (PVLM).

mpam_metrics.description: Key telemetry metrics from the Moral Perimeter Audit Module (MPAM).

adtm_audit_tag.description: Specific audit tag or version string for the current Autonomous Decision Tree Matrix (ADTM) configuration.

temm_execution_count.description: The total number of execution cycles completed by the Temporal Module Manager (TEMM) leading up to the event.
